languages.text: Подосланные проповедники внушают черни, что аколиты — замаскированные еретики-душегубы. Агентов растерзывает разъяренная толпа, заваливая их своими телами.

Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.
languages.original_text: Подосланные проповедники внушают черни, что аколиты — замаскированные еретики-душегубы. Агентов растерзывает разъяренная толпа, заваливая их своими телами.

traits.locale_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.
What the consequences of your attempt to silence the incident will be is known only to the God-Emperor.

Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.
What the consequences of your attempt to silence the incident will be is known only to the God-Emperor.

Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.

languages.text: Obéissant à des ordres confidentiels, un groupe de prédicateurs réussit à convaincre les gens du commun que les acolytes sont de dangereux hérétiques infiltrés dans leurs rangs. Les agents se font tailler en pièces par une foule enragée qui les ensevelit sous une montagne de cadavres.
languages.original_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.

traits.locale_text: Obéissant à des ordres confidentiels, un groupe de prédicateurs réussit à convaincre les gens du commun que les acolytes sont de dangereux hérétiques infiltrés dans leurs rangs. Les agents se font tailler en pièces par une foule enragée qui les ensevelit sous une montagne de cadavres.

languages.text: 密命を帯びたプリーチャーたちは、アコライトたちが悪質な異端者であると庶民に信じ込ませる。諜報員たちは怒りに燃える暴徒に引き裂かれ、死体の山の下に埋められてしまった。
languages.original_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.

traits.locale_text: 密命を帯びたプリーチャーたちは、アコライトたちが悪質な異端者であると庶民に信じ込ませる。諜報員たちは怒りに燃える暴徒に引き裂かれ、死体の山の下に埋められてしまった。

languages.text: 在你的秘密授意之下，一群布道士说服了普通民众，让他们误以为这些审判庭的侍仆是邪恶的异端分子伪装的。这些侍仆被愤怒的暴民撕成了碎片，丢弃在尸山之上。
languages.original_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.

traits.locale_text: 在你的秘密授意之下，一群布道士说服了普通民众，让他们误以为这些审判庭的侍仆是邪恶的异端分子伪装的。这些侍仆被愤怒的暴民撕成了碎片，丢弃在尸山之上。

languages.text: Siguiendo órdenes secretas, un grupo de predicadores convence a la población de que los acólitos son crueles herejes disfrazados. Los agentes quedan destrozados a manos de una muchedumbre enfurecida que los entierra bajo una montaña de cadáveres.
languages.original_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.

traits.locale_text: Siguiendo órdenes secretas, un grupo de predicadores convence a la población de que los acólitos son crueles herejes disfrazados. Los agentes quedan destrozados a manos de una muchedumbre enfurecida que los entierra bajo una montaña de cadáveres.

languages.text: Auf geheimen Befehl hin überzeugt eine Gruppe von Priestern das einfache Volk, dass die Akolythen in Wahrheit brutale Ketzer sind. Die Agenten werden von einem wütenden Mob in Stücke gerissen und unter einem Berg von Leichen begraben.
languages.original_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.

traits.locale_text: Auf geheimen Befehl hin überzeugt eine Gruppe von Priestern das einfache Volk, dass die Akolythen in Wahrheit brutale Ketzer sind. Die Agenten werden von einem wütenden Mob in Stücke gerissen und unter einem Berg von Leichen begraben.

languages.text: Gizli emirler doğrultusunda hareket eden bir grup vaiz; havarilerin aslında kılık değiştirmiş, acımasız kâfirler olduğu konusunda sıradan halkı ikna etti. Ajanlar, öfkeli kalabalık tarafından linç edilerek ceset yığınının altına gömüldü.
languages.original_text: Acting on secret orders, a group of preachers convince the common folk that the acolytes are vicious heretics in disguise. The agents are torn apart by an enraged mob that buries them under a mound of bodies.
